pullRequest.title: GH-3092 Refactor FTP and SFTP outbound specs, handlers
pullRequest.bodyText:
Following are the changes,

Deprecated SFTP and FTP classes outboundAdapter method which takes RemoteFileTemplate. Instead created new methods in both classes which takes SftpRemoteFileTemplate and FtpRemoteFileTemplate respectively.
Deprecated SftpMessageHandlerSpec's constructor which takes RemoteFileTemplate and added new constructors which takes SftpRemoteFileTemplate
Deprecated FtpMessageHandlerSpec's constructor which takes RemoteFileTemplate and added new constructors which takes FtpRemoteFileTemplate. Deprecated FtpMessageHandler's constructor which takes RemoteFileTemplate and added new constructor with ftpRemoteFileTemplate.
Added new test cases in FtpTests and SftpTests

Fixes #3092

commit.message: GH-3092 Refactor FTP and SFTP outbound specs, handlers

nodes.bodyText: Please, add @since 5.4 for all new public API
Please, add some JavaDocs here with the @deprecated tag and explanation in favor of ...
Please, add some JavaDocs to all the new public API.

Please, format JavaDocs properly.
And of course @since 5.4!
There must be a blank line before @since on the class level JavaDocs. This way the author list is much visible.
